introduction-text-home: Studio DMG is <u>multimedia platform</u> for collective reflection on the future, past and present of the museum. All studio's reside and co-exist as part of a larger ecosystem. They mingle, converse and change accordingly.
studio_DIG_intro: Studio Digital Culture and Design functions as a production body within a broader ecology of studios. Specifically, it works on the (continued) development of strategies, research agenda and programming regarding Design and Digital Culture.
